knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Packages and dataset

```{r Project}

library(rmarkdown)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)


small_mammal_data <- read_xlsx("Renosterveld_Sherman trap data_Cat.xlsx")

head(small_mammal_data)

View(small_mammal_data)
summary(small_mammal_data)

```
## Selection of Columns for Analysis and Use

```{r}

alt_data <- small_mammal_data %>% select(`Trap station`, Species)
class(alt_data$`Trap station`)

```

## Convert Trap Station to a Factor

```{r}

alt_data$`Trap station`<-as.factor(alt_data$`Trap station`)
class(alt_data$`Trap station`)

```
## New Table of Data

```{r}

unique_counts_df <- small_mammal_data %>%
  count(`Trap station`)

print(unique_counts_df)


```

## Plots

```{r small_mammal_data, echo=FALSE}

ggplot(small_mammal_data, aes(x = `Trap Station`, y = `Species Count`)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title = "Bar Plot of Species Counted per Trap Station", x = "Trap Station", y = "Species Count")

ggplot(small_mammal_data, aes(x = `Trap Station`, y = `Species Percentage`)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title = "Bar Plot of Species Percentage per Trap Station", x = "Trap Station", y = "Species Percentage")

```
